display_long_description:
The world is under siege—by evil teddy bears! Led by the nefarious mastermind, Frank, these plush menaces have taken over a toy factory and are constructing an army to dominate the globe. Armed with only your motion-controlled weapons, you are humanity's last hope to thwart their adorable yet deadly plans and rescue the innocent panda teddy bears held captive by Frank and his furry minions.
Dive into the action with three game modes, use an arsenal of whimsical weapons, including a freeze ray, water gun, and shotgun, to fend off waves of plush attackers. 
Features:Dynamic Combat: Face off against different types of teddy bears and unexpected challenges across three thrilling game modes. Complete five rounds in each mode to unlock the ultimate boss battle against the diabolical Frank.Varied Arsenal: Choose from a range of playful weapons, including a toy gun, shotgun, water gun, and freeze gun, each with its own unique effects.
Witty Antagonist: Enjoy humorous one-liners from Frank, the sarcastic mastermind bear, as he taunts you throughout your quest.
Retro Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in 80’s style art and expansive factory settings that bring the toy world to life.
Fast-Paced Action: Experience heart-pounding gameplay with bears that come running, flying, and rolling towards you, keeping you on your toes.
Can you survive the onslaught, defeat the evil Frank, and save the world from the not-so-innocent cuddly teddy bears? Gear up for an unforgettable VR adventure in Bearly Armed
